name: Underliner (itch)
description:
The unusual combination of lollipops and bullets invites you to a world full of surprises. Make the bullet's path through colorful lollipops.

Underliner is a puzzle adventure game in an open world with a great number of puzzles and secrets. In puzzles, each idea combines with other ideas, challenging players to think in clever and novel ways.

Puzzles with hidden meanings

Exploring the world full of puzzles that imply allegorical meanings will provoke your imagination.

Reviews “Interesting and extremely unique”
-Review Prizm                                           "A creative 3D puzzle game that makes great use of bouncing mechanics."
-Puzzling Puzzles
